rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with a small foyer that leads to the living spaces and the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious colonial-style living room featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample natural light, designed in a split-level layout. The design integrates modern comforts while preserving a colonial aesthetic.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan kitchen and dining area with colonial elements and large windows to merge indoor and outdoor living. The design emphasizes natural light and connectivity to the courtyard.

openings.description: Main entrance door with colonial detailing
